title: PA-16-05: Release of OGE’s Confidential Financial Disclosure Guide
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/D51BE19F8D3E0556852585BA005BEC56/$FILE/PA- Confidential Financial Disclosure Guide Release final.pdf?open
summary: The U.S. Office of Government Ethics has released a new Confidential Financial Disclosure Guide, which provides comprehensive guidance on financial disclosure requirements for both new entrant and annual confidential reports in the executive branch.
